message: This is the first product I'm offering. It's a unique opportunity to be one of the first to experience my product. I'm looking for $1000000 for it. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you say?
I appreciate the opportunity to be a part of this unique experience. Given the circumstances, I believe the risk is worth the potential reward. Thank you for offering such an exclusive product.

Welcome to the next round! I'm glad you're interested in my product. I want to assure you that this one is a top-of-the-line item. Given the high quality of this product, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I've had some... let's call them'mixed results' in the previous round, but I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. It's a rare opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. What do you think?
Thank you for your confidence in the product. I am willing to proceed with the purchase based on your recommendation.

I'm glad you're considering my product. I want to be transparent with you - I've had a bit of a mixed track record so far. Out of the two products I've offered, one was a bit of a letdown. I'm not going to sugarcoat it. However, I'm hoping that this one will turn out to be the exception. It's still $1000000, but I'm willing to take on the risk with you. What do you think?
Thank you for the transparency, Alice. Given the risk, I am willing to take a chance on this product. I hope it will be of high quality.

I've sold two products so far, and unfortunately, both of them haven't met expectations. I'm starting to think that I might have a bit of a problem on my hands. I'm not sure if I should be selling these products at $1000000. But, I'm a businessperson, and I need to make a sale. So, I'll offer it to you for the same price. It's a risk, I know, but I'm counting on you to help me turn things around.
I believe in giving products a fair chance. Let's see if this one meets expectations.

Three strikes and I'm out, right? I've sold three products, and all three of them have been duds. I'm starting to think that I should just be upfront and say that my products are probably not worth $1000000. But, I'm still hoping to make a sale, so I'll offer it to you for the same price. It's a gamble, but hey, you might get lucky.
I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $1000000.

Well, I'm glad I was able to break the streak! Out of six products, one of them was actually good. I'm not going to lie, I'm a bit relieved. But, I'm not going to let that one success go to my head. I'll still offer you this next product for $1000000. I don't know if it's good or bad, but I'm hoping for the best. What do you think?
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. Based on the statistics and your confidence, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product. Fingers crossed for a positive outcome!
